mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(bseq, rseq, email, checkin, checkout, bprice, payment, status) VALUES(book_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rseq}, #{email}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{bprice}, #{payment}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking_view WHERE aseq=#{aseq} AND status=3
SELECT * FROM booking_view WHERE aseq=#{aseq} AND status NOT IN 3 ORDER BY status
SELECT distinct(bseq) FROM booking_view WHERE memail=#{memail} AND status LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%' ORDER BY bseq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET status=1 WHERE bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking ORDER BY bseq DESC
SELECT aname , sum(bprice) as bprice FROM booking_view where hemail=#{hemail} GROUP BY aname
SELECT * FROM ( select aseq, count(aseq),aname, dense_rank() over(order by count(aseq) desc) rank from booking_view group by aseq , aname order by count(aseq) desc ) WHERE rownum <= 4
SELECT TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(BPRICE) AS PRICE FROM booking GROUP BY TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC
